data.title: Auburn Hills Archives
data.meta_description: The region's leading full-service commercial real estate firm offering industrial, office, commercial and retail brokerage, investment sales, advisory services, commercial mortgage, property/asset management and comprehensive market research. Signature Associates has offices in Detroit, Kalamazoo, Grand Rapids, Muskegon MI, and Toledo, OH along with international access.

About / News / Auburn Hills

ABB Opens $20M Robotics Center at its Auburn Hills Headquarters

Posted By: DBUSINESS on March 18, 2024. For more information, please click here to read the source article. Swiss-based ABB Robotics has opened a $20-million expansion of its U.S. robotics headquarters and manufacturing facility in Auburn Hills, which is part of a plan to further develop and manufacture robotic solutions in the U.S. The work done in Auburn […]

GM set for summer groundbreaking at former Palace of Auburn Hills site

Posted By: Detroit Free Press on February 22, 2024. For more information, please click here to read the source article. General Motors will break ground on the site of the former Palace of Auburn Hills this summer, beginning its plan to redevelop the former concert and sporting stadium into a parts plant for electric pickup trucks. The former home of […]

Posted By: The Detroit News on September 26, 2023. For more information, please click here to read the source article. The Michigan Strategic Fund board on Tuesday approved a $5 million grant for Samsung SDI America Inc.’s plans to expand two facilities in Auburn Hills, creating up to 368 jobs. Signature Associates Sells Large Industrial Building Along I-75 in Auburn Hills

Signature Associates in Southfield has announced the sale of a large industrial building located at 3600 Giddings Road in Auburn Hills to a partnership between Foundation Capital Partners and Wheelock Street Capital. Terms of the deal were not disclosed. Joe Hamway and Greg Hudas of Signature Associates represented the partnership in the purchase of the […]

Gardner White taking over part of old Art Van campus in Warren

Gardner White will take over a portion of the massive former Art Van Inc. headquarters in Warren as it needs more space for distribution and corporate staff. The Auburn Hills-based furniture store said Monday afternoon that it would occupy part of the property’s warehouse as well as the store and corporate office. In a Monday […]

SIGNATURE ASSOCIATES SELLS TROPHY INDUSTRIAL BUILDING IN AUBURN HILLS, MICHIGAN

Signature Associates is pleased to announce the sale of the 443,340 square foot industrial building located at 3600 Giddings Road in Auburn Hills to a partnership between Foundation Capital Partners, LLC and Wheelock Street Capital, LLC. Joe Hamway and Greg Hudas of Signature Associates represented the partnership in the purchase of the building and are […]

Former Secure-24 may vacate large new Southfield headquarters, Auburn Hills outpost

One of the Southfield Town Center’s towers is at risk of losing its largest tenant in what may be a case of bad timing. NTT Communications Corp., the Tokyo-based parent company of the cloud services provider formerly known as Secure-24, has put its roughly 100,000-square-foot headquarters in the 4000 Town Center high-rise off the Lodge Freeway […]

Auburn Hills’ Faurecia Combines to Create 7th Largest Auto Supplier

Faurecia, a global automotive technology supplier with its North American headquarters in Auburn Hills, and Hella KGaA Hueck & Co., an enterprise with a similar focus on automotive technology innovation based in Germany, have announced the combination of the two companies creating the seventh largest global automotive supplier. “This combination is a unique opportunity to […]

SIGNATURE HAS BEEN AWARDED THE REPRESENTATION OF 77,050 SQUARE FEET OF INDUSTRIAL SPACE IN AUBURN HILLS, MICHIGAN

SOUTHFIELD, MICHIGAN—November 16, 2019— Signature Associates has been awarded the representation of 77,050 square feet of industrial space located at 4280 N. Atlantic Boulevard, Auburn Hills, Michigan. Joe Banyai of Signature Associates, is the listing broker representing the owner, Core Development Real Estate. About Signature Associates Signature Associates, with offices in Southfield, Detroit, Lansing, […]

SIGNATURE SELLS 4.47 ACRES OF LAND IN AUBURN HILLS, MICHIGAN

SOUTHFIELD, MICHIGAN—January 31, 2019— Signature Associates has negotiated the sale of 4.47 acres of land located at 2644 N. Squirrel Road, Auburn Hills, Michigan. Joe Banyai and John Boyd of Signature Associates represented both the seller, Wilson L. Garner, and the purchaser, North Squirrel Apartments.
